Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he intensively wrote before his death, and the tremendous chaos and reality in the world after his death. The world depicted in Miyazawa’s poems has now gone out of fashion with numerous changes and development in society
